Question
========

A person achieves a score of 14.8 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 12.6 with a standard deviation 2.7. The z-score of the person with 14.8 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.32
* -0.14
* 0.81

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.32: Incorrect
-0.14: Incorrect
* 0.81: Correct
